title: Gallery
description: A curated collection of projects, experiments, and creative explorations

items.title: Neural Dreams
items.description: AI-generated artwork exploring the boundaries of machine creativity

details.fullDescription: An experimental series using neural networks to generate surreal dreamscapes. This project explores the intersection of artificial intelligence and human creativity, pushing the boundaries of what machines can create when trained on abstract concepts and emotions.

items.title: Code Poetry
items.description: Beautiful algorithms that read like verse

details.fullDescription: An exploration of code as a literary medium. Each algorithm is crafted not just for functionality, but for aesthetic beauty and poetic expression. Variables become metaphors, functions become stanzas, and the entire codebase reads like a collection of haikus.

items.title: Midnight UI Kit
items.description: Dark mode component library with subtle animations

details.fullDescription: A comprehensive UI component library designed specifically for dark mode interfaces. Features smooth micro-interactions, accessibility-first design principles, and a cohesive color system optimized for reduced eye strain during late-night coding sessions.

items.title: Pixel Garden
items.description: Interactive generative art using cellular automata

details.fullDescription: A living digital garden where pixels grow and evolve following simple rules. Based on Conway's Game of Life and other cellular automata, this piece creates ever-changing patterns that never repeat, each session producing unique visual compositions.

What if your codebase had a sound? Syntax Symphony analyzes code structure and transforms it into musical patterns. Variables become notes, functions become melodies, and entire programs become symphonies. Each programming language has its own unique sound signature.

items.title: Whisper Thoughts
items.description: A minimalist journaling app focused on privacy and reflection

details.fullDescription: Digital journaling reimagined with privacy at its core. All entries are encrypted locally, never leaving your device. The interface encourages mindful reflection with gentle prompts and a distraction-free writing environment. No accounts, no tracking, just you and your thoughts.

A terminal color scheme inspired by 80s cyberpunk aesthetics. Neon glows, high contrast, and carefully selected syntax highlighting make coding feel like you're hacking in a retro-futuristic world. Optimized for long coding sessions with reduced eye strain.

items.title: Quantum Blur
items.description: CSS shader experiments with quantum-inspired effects

details.fullDescription: Pushing CSS to its limits with custom shaders that create quantum-inspired visual effects. Particles that exist in multiple states, blurs that respond to user interaction, and colors that shift based on probability distributions. All without a single line of JavaScript.

items.title: Data Garden
items.description: Visualizing personal metrics as growing plants

details.fullDescription: A gamified approach to personal analytics where your habits and activities grow virtual plants. The healthier your real-world habits, the more your digital garden flourishes. Makes data tracking feel rewarding and organic rather than clinical and mechanical.
